1: I will exalt you, Yahweh, for you have raised me up and have not allowed my enemies to rejoice over me.\q
2: Yahweh my God, I cried to you for help, and you healed me.\q
3:
Yahweh, you have brought up my soul from Sheol; you have kept me alive from going down to the grave.

\q
4: Sing praises to Yahweh, you his faithful people! Give thanks when you remember his holiness.\q
5:
For his anger is only for a moment; but his favor is for a lifetime.\q Weeping comes for a night, but joy comes in the morning.


\q
6: In confidence I said, "I will never be shaken."\q
7: Yahweh, by your favor you established me as a strong mountain; but when you hid your face, I was troubled.\q
8:
I cried to you, Yahweh, and sought favor from my Lord!

\q
9: What advantage is there in my death, if I go down to the grave? Will the dust praise you? Will it declare your trustworthiness?\q
10:
Hear, Yahweh, and have mercy on me! Yahweh, be my helper.

\q
11: You have turned my mourning into dancing; you have removed my sackcloth and clothed me with gladness.\q
12: So now my glory will sing praise to you and not be silent; Yahweh my God, I will give thanks to you forever!
